meanings.definition: The state or condition of being untouchable.
meanings.sent1: Her untouchabilities made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The untouchabilities of the ancient artifact fascinated the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The cat's untouchabilities were on full display as it gracefully avoided the toddler's attempts to pet it.
meanings.sent4: His untouchabilities in the game made him the star player.
meanings.sent5: The untouchabilities of the secret formula kept it safe from prying eyes.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being untouchable.
meanings.sent1: The untouchabilities of the diamond made it highly sought after.
meanings.sent2: She admired the untouchabilities of the mountain peak from afar.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's untouchabilities made the villains tremble in fear.
meanings.sent4: The untouchabilities of her argument left her opponent speechless.
meanings.sent5: The untouchabilities of the fortress made it impregnable.
